1.text: Choose a makeup remover that works with the type of eyeliner you are wearing.

2.text: Saturate a flat, cotton pad with the product.

3.text: Press the pad against your eye for 20 seconds.

4.text: Wipe off the eyeliner with downward strokes.

5.text: Choose a facial wipe that is alcohol- and fragrance-free.

6.text: Use the edge of the wipe to wipe along the base of your eyelashes.

7.text: Rinse and wash your face with your usual cleanser.

9.text: Scoop a small amount of petroleum jelly onto a cotton swab.

10.text: Run the swab along the base of your eyelashes.

11.text: Wash your face with a gentle cleanser when you've removed the eyeliner.

12.text: Use coconut oil, olive oil, or jojoba oil to break down the eyeliner.

13.text: Use your fingertips to massage the oil gently over closed eyelids.

14.text: Wait ten seconds, then use a cotton pad to wipe the oil off with downward strokes.

15.text: Rinse to remove traces of oil and eyeliner.
